title: Felicity Huffman’s Booty Academy: Los Angeles
featuredTitle: Felicity Huffman’s Booty Academy: Los Angeles
description: Felicity Huffman and Sir Mix-a-Lot judge women’s character and booties. Find out who’s got the right behind and who’s going to be left behind.
quote: Our anaconda don’t want none. Cover up your bottom and go.
altHero: Felicity Huffman as a judge with a gavel
alt1: Huffman, BoJack Horseman, and Sir Mix-a-Lot at the judges panel before three contestants
